note.p: Education: Brasenose College, Oxford (matriculated 1651); Peterhouse, Cambridge; MB (1655), MD (1660)
Other RSActivity: Consulted regarding a mine in Cornwall and his connections to it (1663).

Notes: The election date is Hoare's re-election date into the Society after the grant of the second charter in April 1663. All Fellows admitted in a two-month window after this charter, until 22 June 1663, are considered Original Fellows. He was previously admitted on 15 October 1662.
In index to BR, Notes and Records (vol 7, no 2) is cited as a source.
